articles.title: Amazon leads $20 Mn round in kids' fashion brand Hopscotch - Entrackr
articles.description: Kids' fashion brand Hopscotch has raised $20 million in a funding round led by Amazon.

articles.title: Will the latest government move kill India's nascent EV boom? - The Economic Times
articles.description: The government is slashing these subsidies and the makers of electric two-wheelers see it as a regressive step which will drag India's EV revolution, which is led by two-wheelers. The share of electric vehicles in total vehicle sales in India is currently aro…
articles.content: Electric two-wheelers are driving the EV revolution in India. Cumulative sales of electric vehicles (EVs) in India crossed the one-million milestone for the first time in 2022-23. Two-wheelers accoun… [+5774 chars]

articles.title: For First Time In a Decade, FDI Inflows Into India Fall - The Wire
articles.description: Foreign investment in India declined on the back of high inflation and weak demand in the US and Europe, while Indian companies also lowered investments in other countries during the financial year 2022-23.
articles.content: New Delhi: Inflows of foreign direct investment (FDI) into India dipped for the first time in a decade, falling 16% to $71 billion (on a gross basis) during the financial year 2022-23 because of high… [+2121 chars]

articles.title: Tata Motors To Launch Tata Altroz iCNG Soon Starting At Rs 7 Lakhs — Know Features, Variants - ABP Live
articles.description: The Altroz iCNG comes in six variants, XE, XM+, XM+(S), XZ, XZ+(S)and XZ+O(S).

articles.title: Rupee inches up on possible dollar inflows, yuan recovery - Reuters India
articles.description: The Indian rupee, having opened slightly weaker, crawled up on Wednesday, supported by dollar inflows and recovery on the Chinese yuan, traders said.
articles.content:
MUMBAI, May 24 (Reuters) - The Indian rupee, having opened slightly weaker, crawled up on Wednesday, supported by dollar inflows and recovery on the Chinese yuan, traders said.
